ticket.title: Fix in cascaed_eager_loading_test.rb applied to 3-0-stable but not master
ticket.original-body:
Hi,
This commit: https://github.com/rails/rails/commit/918bf847d89df2aa06d3589ff88094729c67dbd9
Is applied to 3-0-stable: https://github.com/rails/rails/commits/3-0-stable/activerecord/test/cases/associations/cascaded_eager_loading_test.rb
But not to master: https://github.com/rails/rails/commits/master/activerecord/test/cases/associations/cascaded_eager_loading_test.rb
It should presumably be in master also.
Thanks
